message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,500.  What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure it's a good deal for me.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  While $9,500 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $11,000. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. How about $10,750?
